## AtomEventPool.once() method

添加某个事件名的监听函数。只执行一次

**Signature:**

```typescript
once<E extends keyof P, T extends P[E]>(e: E, listener: AtomEventListener<T>, options?: AtomEventListenerOnceOptions): AtomEventCanceler;
```
